item.title: Building a RESTful API with Symfony3
item.description: Intro I’m going to be utilizing Symfony 3 to build out a RESTful API. Disclaimer: I am not a PHP developer. I am merely documenting my learning and process I was exposed to. This walkthrough does not address security flaws which exist in this application. Stuff you need to install PHP (I’m using version 7.1.2) MySQL Symfony framework The easiest way to tackle the first 2 steps above are via homebrew.
